9.21.18  5:56 pm   here's what i think i'm gonna try: change keys during a song and make it sound as bad and unfitting as possible. that way, i'll get closer to knowing what i like and what sounds good depending on the situation (in regards to changing keys/going into a new section). i hope this helps make me better at doing key changes that sound fitting and natural

9.21.18  5:51 pm   i did this nice bass fill but it doesn't really fit the slow and relaxed vibe of the song, so my gut is telling me to can it, but i really like the fill but i don't think it fits the bigger picture of the song. these are the tiny decisions i get caught up on, but it actually also doesn't feel like a tiny decision. seems pretty important honestly. maybe i should take a walk and come back and see if i still like the bass fill? i've been thinking about it for too long. has stuff like this ever happened to you? how do you handle it?
